summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Urban Commuting & Public Transport website system. All core functionalities are working correctly including public pages, admin authentication, CRUD operations, live tracking with Leaflet.js maps, and auto-refresh functionality.
passed_tests: All 16 backend API endpoints working (100% success rate)
Public route search and live bus tracking
Leaflet.js map integration with bus markers
Crowd level indicators with correct color coding (Low=Green, Medium=Orange, High=Red)
Sample data pre-populated (3 routes: 101, 202, 303 and 3 buses)
Admin dashboard with stats and quick actions
Bus location updates and bus list management
Responsive design and proper data-testid attributes
Real-time bus marker popups on map

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (minor navigation timeout in one test scenario)
success_percentage.map_functionality: 100% (Leaflet.js integration working with bus markers and popups)
success_percentage.admin_functionality: 95% (all CRUD operations working, minor timeout on logout redirect)
